title: The One Year Love Language Minute Devotional: A 365-Day Devotional for Christian Couples
description: Are you and your spouse speaking the same language? He sends you flowers when what you really want is time to talk. She gives you a hug when what you really need is a home-cooked meal. The problem isn’t love―it’s your love language. The Love Languages Devotional is your daily guide to how to express heartfelt love to your loved one.
author: Gary Chapman
